page.title: 09POLICING / SUPERNATURAL
page.content: There is not a high incidence of crime in the{LIFTON}area.Three police families live in the village with{ {OKEHAMPTON}(14 miles distance) being the local controling office.{BIDEFORD} is the area police station some 40 miles distance.A foot patrol does exist but traffic control is the main priority.Farm regulations are also delt with.There is a small amount of pilfering and some rustling of lifestock but overall{LIFTON}is a peacful,law abiding community. There is a ghost at{LIFTON}Park house. In 1840 the ghost was sighted by a traveller,the ghost was a lady.... Worthan Manor is reputed to be haunted.The author of this page has a grandad who owns a farm just below { {LIFTON}Park house.
